resources.string: Genesis Chess
NOTICE: A valid email address must be used to activate the account.
You MUST click the activation link sent to your email before logging in. Check your inbox and junk email folders for an email from:\n\tnotification@genesischess.com
Are you sure you want to delete this game? The game can not be recovered.
Are you sure you want to delete this archived game? The game will not be deleted from the server.
Are you sure you want to logout of your account? Online games will be unavailable until you login.
Are you sure you want to register an account with the following information?
Are you sure you want to resign from this game? You will lose PSR if this is a random game.
Are you sure you want to Nudge your opponent? This will email them and give them one week to move before you can close the game.
Your opponent has been idle. Are you sure you want to force end the game?
Are you sure you want to make a local copy this game?
Set the time alloted for the computer to think. Longer times makes the computer stronger.
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/viewform?formkey=dEVMcnVvbDFMWkZ0azNyQ2hRR3RjZWc6MQ
You are waiting to be matched with an opponent in the following game types:
Are you sure you want to mark all messages as read?
Are you sure you want to delete all local games? This operation can not be undone!
Are you sure you want to force a full resync of all active games?
Are you sure you want to force a full resync of all archive games?
Are you sure you want to force a full resync of all game messages?
Click \"Run\" to start the single threaded benchmark of your CPU. It will run for about 5 seconds per game type.
Your opponent has requested a draw. Do you want to accept or decline the draw?
Are you sure you want to send a request for a draw to your opponent?
Your opponent has neither accepted or declined your offer of a draw.

Warning. Genesis chess is not a typical chess game! Please read the full rules.

 1) The board starts out blank.
		(hint: place a king first)
 2) Pawns are awsome!
		(hint: they can move backwards)
